body: **Describe the bug** S3 integration with Temporal doesn't work properly: ``` 3 INVALID_ARGUMENT: only operation = is support for CloseTime ``` **To Reproduce** Temporal config: ```yaml archival: history: state: "enabled" enableRead: true provider: s3store: region: "us-east-1" visibility: state: "enabled" enableRead: true provider: s3store: region: "us-east-1" namespaceDefaults: archival: history: state: "enabled" URI: "s3://my-temporal-archive" visibility: state: "enabled" URI: "s3://my-temporal-archive" ``` **Expected behavior** No error **Screenshots** **Additional context** Temporal v1.7.0 Helm installation Found a similar bug here: https://github.com/uber/cadence/issues/3544 Duplicate in web repo: https://github.com/temporalio/web/issues/273
title: [Bug] 3 INVALID_ARGUMENT: only operation = is support for CloseTime
